import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";// Material Kit 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";const{lg}=boxShadows;const{size}=typography;const{text,white}=colors;const{borderRadius}=borders;export default{defaultProps:{disableAutoFocusItem:true},styleOverrides:{paper:{minWidth:pxToRem(160),boxShadow:lg,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," ").concat(pxToRem(8)),fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main,textAlign:"left",backgroundColor:"".concat(white.main," !important"),borderRadius:borderRadius.md}}};
